item.title: 30 Quick Numpy Tips and Tricks for Beginners
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction This guide focuses on mastering Python and NumPy, a powerful library for numerical computing. It offers 30 tips and tricks to enhance coding skills, covering foundational matrix operations and advanced statistical analysis techniques. Practical examples accompany each tip, allowing users to navigate complex data manipulations and scientific computations. The guide aims to unlock the […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction This guide focuses on mastering Python and NumPy, a powerful library for numerical computing. It offers 30 tips and tricks to enhance coding skills, covering foundational matrix operations and advanced statistical analysis techniques. Practical examples accompany each tip, allowing users to navigate complex data manipulations and scientific computations. The guide aims to unlock the […]

The post 30 Quick Numpy Tips and Tricks for Beginners appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Paramanu-Ganita: A New Mathematical Model that Outperforms LLaMa, Falcon, and PaLM
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Large language models (LLMs) have dramatically reshaped computational mathematics. These advanced AI systems, designed to process and mimic human-like text, are now pushing boundaries in mathematical fields. Their ability to understand and manipulate complex concepts has made them invaluable in research and development. Among these innovations stands Paramanu-Ganita, a creation of Gyan AI Research. […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Large language models (LLMs) have dramatically reshaped computational mathematics. These advanced AI systems, designed to process and mimic human-like text, are now pushing boundaries in mathematical fields. Their ability to understand and manipulate complex concepts has made them invaluable in research and development. Among these innovations stands Paramanu-Ganita, a creation of Gyan AI Research. […]

item.title: LLMs Exposed: Are They Just Cheating on Math Tests?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Large Language Models (LLMs) are advanced natural language processing models that have achieved remarkable success in various benchmarks for mathematical reasoning. These models are designed to process and understand human language, enabling them to perform tasks such as question answering, language translation, and text generation. LLMs are typically trained on large datasets scraped from […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Large Language Models (LLMs) are advanced natural language processing models that have achieved remarkable success in various benchmarks for mathematical reasoning. These models are designed to process and understand human language, enabling them to perform tasks such as question answering, language translation, and text generation. LLMs are typically trained on large datasets scraped from […]

The post LLMs Exposed: Are They Just Cheating on Math Tests? appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Top 10 Tableau Alternatives to Explore in 2024

item.title: Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App

This initiative signals a shift in India’s technological landscape, empowering developers and enterprises to harness the […]

item.title: Get a Summary of Trending Topics on X with Grok-Powered Stories Feature
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, has introduced a new feature called Stories, powered by Elon Musk’s AI chatbot, Grok. Available exclusively for X’s premium subscribers, Stories aims to revolutionize news consumption by providing concise summaries of trending topics within the platform’s Explore section. Let’s delve into how this innovative feature works […]
